posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I have a T206 Thomas of the Athlectics for sale. I would like to get 15.00 dollars for it.  I will accept offers to however.  If intersted please email me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  Thanks for looking at my post.

William

If the card is still available , I'll take it. PM me with the info and I will get payment out.

Bob

The Thomas is Sold everyone thank you to everyone that emailed about it.

William
Represent! Look at him throwing out the gang sign, I didn't know he was a crip!

[quote name="JohnnyHarmonica" post=824271]Represent! Look at him throwing out the gang sign, I didn't know he was a crip![/QUOTE]
